TopicTitle: Mod to choose which star to track for my solar panels

Articles.Content:
I recall a mod that allowed us to choose which star to track for our solar panels. But I can't remember what it was called. 

Here's my test probe at Telos, basking in the light of Ollum, a sub star. But as you can see,  Sun exposure is NaN...

Help me out, please?
And if you have multiple stars to choose from, you probably already have Kopernicus installed.
Thanks! Reinstalling Koprnicus solved the issue!
